mapper.select: select a.project_id, a.project_name, a.project_key, a.project_content, b.user_id as project_manager from( select project.project_id as project_id, project_name , project_key ,project_content from project_user join project on project_user.project_id = project.project_id join user on user.user_id = project_user.user_id where user.user_id = #{user_id} ) as a join ( select project_user.user_id as user_id , project_user.project_id as project_id from project_user join project on project_user.project_id = project.project_id where project_user.project_position = '팀장' ) as b on a.project_id = b.project_id
mapper.insert: insert into project_user(project_id, user_id, project_position, authority) values(#{project_id}, #{user_id}, #{project_position}, #{authority})
